data.rationale:
use great algorithm make this module very efficient in guess
    encoding, especially East Asia language, precision can be up to 99%,
    optimized for web encoding detect(up to 99.9%)

    now the module has been published as
    search.cpan.org/~foolfish/CharsetDetector-1.0.0

    demo site is http://fish.lua.cn/cgi-bin/chardet.cgi
